abstract: Foster Huntington talks to T about Richard Avedon's portraits of people living on the left side of Mississippi.
snippet: Foster Huntington talks to T about Richard Avedon's portraits of people living on the left side of Mississippi.
lead_paragraph: Off the Shelf is a regular column that spotlights the books that inspire great talents, designers and entrepreneurs.

headline.main: Off the Shelf | 'In the American West'
